price: 35 Nous avons donc fait sortir de la ville les croyants qui s’y trouvaient,
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
